name: Peter William
appearance: An older man in his later years, usually seen as a sturdy factory owner typical of a provincial industrialist.
personality: Hardworking, traditional, and business-oriented, with a strong sense of responsibility toward his family business.
background: Peter William operated a distillery in Cassandra, which appeared to be quite large and primarily produced vodka. In 2002, he suddenly fell ill and died in the hospital, leaving the distillery to his son.
secrets: His death may be connected to Patrizio von Samsa’s human experiments

clues.clueText: Peter William died suddenly in 2002 after falling ill.
His death may have links to human experimentation conducted by Patrizio von Samsa.

relationships.history: Peter founded and ran the distillery before passing it on to Abel.

notes: Peter William is already deceased before the investigators’ arrival.
